sentences.en: Areas allow you to subdivide a project into smaller, more manageable sections.
sentences.cn: 区域使你可以将项目分成多个更小的、更容易管理的部分。

sentences.en: Subdivide the diagonal section at the back-left side of the triangle with one diagonal-back parting.
sentences.cn: 在和对角线的-背面的三角形的背面留下的边细分对角线的区段离别的。

sentences.en: This is useful when a method is too big and you want to subdivide blocks of it into different methods.
sentences.cn: 如果一个方法太大并且您想要把此方法再细分为不同的方法，这个重构将很有用。
